registrationConfirmation.subject: Welcome to FSQ360 - Your Account is Ready!
registrationConfirmation.body:
Hi {{name}},

Welcome to FSQ360 – we're excited to have you on board!

Your account has been successfully created. You can now access the platform and get started.

Here are your login details:
Username: {{username}}
Temporary Password: {{password}}
Login URL: https://fs-demo.vercel.app/login

Please log in using the link above and change your password at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for choosing FSQ360 – we look forward to supporting your success!

Warm regards,
Team FSQ-360
"Digitalizing Food Safety – Seamlessly."


*Please do not reply to this email. This is a computer-generated email.
